viewData.name: Samsung 10.5" Galaxy Tab A 32GB Tablet (Wi-Fi, Black)
viewData.short_description: Buy Samsung 10.5" Galaxy Tab A 32GB Tablet (Wi-Fi, Black) featuring 1.8 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 450 8-Core, 3GB RAM | 32GB Storage 10.5" 1920 x 1200 Display. Review Samsung Tab A
viewData.long_description: Enjoy music, movies, and more with the 10.5" Galaxy Tab A 32GB Tablet from Samsung. This 10.5" tablet features an immersive 1920 x 1200 display and quad speakers with Dolby Atmos surround sound to provide you with a cinematic viewing experience. Aside from multimedia uses, this tablet can also tackle plenty of apps thanks to its 1.8 GHz Qualcomm Snapdragon 450 eight-core processor and 3GB of RAM. For data, it has 32GB of built-in storage; however, you can utilizes its microSD slot for additional space. For your convenience, the Galaxy Tab A also features facial recognition, so you can quickly and easily log into your device with just a glance, even in dark environments.
